name: com.dboi.hauppauge
description: This app adds support for the Z-wave devices made by Hauppauge (http://www.hauppauge.de).

scripts.run: copy /y app.json.base app.json && athom app run
scripts.validate: copy /y app.json.base app.json && athom app validate
scripts.build: copy /y app.json.base app.json && athom app build
scripts.install: copy /y app.json.base app.json && athom app install

author: Oliver Ickler
